Name: White Hornet Tanto
Additional Info: If damage dealt by it would reduce a target tounder 1 HP, they can be instead be left Unconsciousat 1 HP if the wielder so chooses.

Name: Mono-Star
Additional Info: Unlike a typical melee weapon not designed for throwing,this weapon continues to halve SP when thrown. Additionally, throwing thisweapon counts as half of a 2 ROF attack.When thrown, whenever you cause the Foreign Object Critical Injury, thevictim rolls again on the Critical Injury table until they roll a Critical Injury thatisn’t Foreign Object and suffers that Critical Injury in addition to the ForeignObject Critical Injury.

Name: Mono-Wakizashi
Additional Info: With the correct biometric Key, the edge vibrates making it Ignore armor if it is lower than SP7.

Name: Ranger Combat Boomerang
Additional Info: It cannot be used to make a melee attack. Unlike a typical melee weapon not designed for throwing this weapon continues to halve SP when thrown. Additionally, throwing this weapon counts as half of a 2 ROF attack.

Name: Utility Tomahawk
Additional Info: Combination Icetool-Crowbar-Throwing Axe-Machete. Unlike a typical meleeweapon not designed for throwing, this weapon continues to halve SP whenthrown.

Name: Weeping Reaver Katana
Additional Info: Once per minute, As an Action, the user can direct the Weeping Reaver to coat itself with one or more fluids loaded into its handle, multiple applications of the same fluid do nothing, up to 3 fluids can be combined at once, Each fluid remains effective for 1 minute.

Name: Solo Wolf and Bot Mono-Katana
Additional Info: To the untrained eye, it appears to be an actual green Kendachi Mono-Katana requiring a DV13 Perception or a Weaponstech Check to notice the difference.

Name: MonoKatana
Additional Info: With the correct biometric Key, the edge vibrates making it Ignore armor if it is lower than SP7.

Name: Rhinocefist
Additional Info: Repairing a destroyed Rhinoceﬁst can be done with either a DV13 Weaponstech or Land Vehicle Tech Check, and takesonly 6 hours. On a failed Check, halfway through the repair, you realize thatyou have to start the repair from scratch.

Name: Style-6
Description: The Astra Style-6 is a cheap Spanish polymer one-shot pistol that fires 5mm fragmenting plastic rounds.

Name: Cybermag 15
Description: The Dai Lung Cybermag 15 is a light autopistol, considered a cheap Hong Kong knockoff, often used boosters and other street trash.
.22 Caseless load version of The Federated Arms X-22 pistol.

Name: X-22
Description: The Federated Arms X-22 is light "Polymer-one-shot" cheap plastic pistol. Available in 13 designer colors.

Name: X-38
Description: The Federated Arms X-38 is an inexpensive .38 caseless automatic pistol.

Name: Type-12 Police Pistol
Description: The Towa Manufacturing Type-12 Police Pistol is the standard handgun for Japanese policewomen and high-rankers. It's designed to stop or intimidate criminals. This is an incredibly reliable revolver.

Name: HB-10
Description: Gun with an elegant design, ideal as emergency weapon.

Name: "Ace" Revolver
Additional Info: Can be concealed without a check.
Description: The Colt "Ace" Revolver is a small, easily conealable revolver. "Truly an Ace up the sleeve beats a dead man's hand every time..."

Name: .38 "Detective"
Description: A nice revolver, still if they went to all the trouble of making the front of the weapon as snag free as possible, the least they could have done was add a hammer shroud.

Name: OPA-38
Description: A very small handgun, perfect for a back up piece or a woman's purse.

Name: EL-552
Description: Geind is a new name in firearms manufacturing, but the new kid is coming out swinging and catching everyones eye with their stylish weapons. The EL-552 is no exception. This break open .38 is extremely well made and more accurate than a gun this size should be.

Name: Gavil HVS-06
Description: This pocket revolver does not disappoint, with all the refined style and performance one expects from a Luigi Franchi firearm.

Name: Gavil Z11
Description: A more traditional, but still extremely stylish pocket revolver from Luigi Franchi, the second in their Gavil line.

Name: "Whisper" Revolver
Additional Info: Shots made with this weapon are completely silent.
Description: Billed as the quietest handgun ever made, the whisper certainly lives up to its reputation. It is possibly the perfect handgun for close quarters assassination. The revolver is fully enclosed and features a built in silencer. Hammerless and sporting a built in laser sight along with a digital display on the rear of the gun which counts the number of rounds fired. This gun is so silent that even with audio enhancement you cannot hear it from more than twenty feet away, without audio boost you would have to be standing next to it in a silent room to hear it. It fires cased .22 caliber subsonic rounds which must be individually loaded.

Name: Sphex .38
Description: A self -defense weapon, made mainly for women. Probably one of the biggest commercial success in year 2019, for the Nova company.

Name: Corsair .22
Description: The corsair can be put in ugly polymer weapons museum at a good place. It's a gun with a retro style design, with a beautiful bronzed shape and a imitation wood grip which could nearly looks real. It's a single-action weapon (you must re-arm with the hand), so it's quite long to shoot again.

Name: "Little Joe"
Description: In spite of its name, this pistol is primarily intended for women who also want to play pirates.

Name: WSA Autopistol
Description: The Arasaka WSA Autopistol, otherwise known as the Arasaka WSA Automatic Pistol, is a standard-issue sidearm for all Arasaka troops and executives

Name: "253" Autopistol
Description: The barrel shroud of this weapon doesn't move, and instead is specially vented and baffled to act as a limited supressor, reducing report considerably. The slide is the small protrusion on the rear of the weapon.

Name: Laser-Niner
Description: The Budget Arms Laser-Niner is a quality auto/machine pistol, sleek in design, which fires 9mm caseless rounds. Made to security specifications, it is built for combat.. It has a 15-shot magazine.

Name: M97P
Description: The Beretta M97P aka Beretta 97P[1] is an advanced pistol with integral underbarrel sight, used extensively in the EuroTheater. It uses plasticased ammo.

Name: 101-T
Description: This slim-line light personal weapon is favored by corporate personnel worldwide. A wondernine that fits in your pocket.

Name: 110-T
Description: The big brother of the 101, the 110-T is a full-frame automatic wondernine with integral laser sighting. A popular choice in higher-end wondernines.

Name: 357-S
Description: Military purpose gun, the 357S has already been purchased by several european armies.

Name: Goaxing Xiuxi CM-3
Description: The CCMMC Goaxing Xiuxi CM-3 is the civilian market pistol which is the maximum firepower that a civilian can legally own in Mainland China.

Name: Alpha-Omega Competition Pistol
Description: The Colt Alpha-Omega Competition Pistol is a semiauto, double-action pistol. It has a 10-round magazine in the shooter's choice of .45 ACCP or 10mm caseless.The pistol comes with a barrel compensator and shooter's interface as standard factory options.

Name: Enforcement 10 Sidearm
Description: The Colt Enforcement 10 Sidearm is targeted toward the military and law enforcement markets. It is built on a solid, heavy frame which helps to absorb the recoil. The receiver and slide are fashioned from Sortex, a tough, high-density ceramic composite developed for use in firearms manufacture. The pistol is the standard firearm for Petrochem's security guards, soldiers, and naval personnel. It is corrosion and dirt-resistant and extremely reliable. Standard models come in matte black, blued metallic, and marine stainless finishes. For an extra fee, the matte black Sortex receiver and slide can be made in one of several camouflage patterns and will not wear off.

Name: Streetmaster
Description: The Dai Lung Streetmaster is medium autopistol.

Name: "Bala" Autopistol
Description: It would be a decent weapon if it didn't jam so much.

Name: "Han" Autopistol
Description: This Mauser inspired handgun is a popular weapon amongst asian smugglers, pirates, and bandits.

Name: CRP-22
Description: A typical Dai Lung disposable, it is true garbage, it jams frequently, it has no sights whatsoever, maintenance on it is a bitch, and its ugly as sin. Still it sells well in the third world due to its extremely low price.

Name: "3 spot" Machine Pistol
Description: FN Browning "3-Spot" Machine Pistol is 3-Spot machine-/automatic pistol is designed for law enforcement duties in the more dangerous parts of Europe. Set for purely accurate fire suppression. The magazine holds 24 rounds. This pistol is in use in the U.K., France, Belgium and Italy.

Name: X-9
Description: The Federated Arms X-9mm is a medium auto pistol. Saturday Solo's gun, used as a standard military sidearm in the U.S. and E.C.C.

Name: Goncz-Taurus Pistol
Description: Goncz-Taurus Pistol is standard officer-issue weapon in the Pan-Americas, and for many years illegally smuggled into the southwestern United States, this pistol has been made famous by that notorious nomad gang, the Bat People. The G-T Pistol is manufactured by Taurus Brasilia de Brasil to their exacting standards and is imported by De Santos Ltd.Two versions of this weapon are available: the 9mm semiautomatic, and the machine pistol version with a selective fire capability. A choice of fifteen or thirty round magazines is available. Dealers' prices vary.

Name: Glock-33 Machine Pistol
Description: Glock-33 Machine Pistol is pistol created by Glock Int. introduces the latest in the further development of their famous line of semi-auto pistols for thirtieth anniversary. Glock has taken their 10mm Glock-20, given it a gas porting on the barrel for excellent controllability, and thirty 10mm cartridges per magazine. Note: This pistol can also use the standard 20-round pistol magazine, making it slightly more concealable and compact (P).

Name: Glock-33AV Machine Pistol
Description: The successor to the G33 is in line with its illustrious ancestors, a model of design and manufacture.

Name: M-11 Bolt Pistol
Description: Hammer M-11 Blot Pistol is the most common bolter in use, the M-11 has better recoil control than most flechette weapons.

Name: Gamad
Description: IMI Gamad is Pistol. This stubby 10mm pistol gets its name ("Dwarf") from its small size. First designed for the Mossad, the Gamad was only released onto the foreign market in the last three years. The weapon comes with a laser sight only, but a smartgun variant is available. This is the weapon that Mossad agents have come to be known by. These pistols are also popular as back-up weapons.

Name: Type 97
Description: Kang Tao Type 97 is famous 9mm Beretta copy. Common polymer one-shot in South America.

Name: Type 108
Description: Cheap polymer, with medium stats. Very popular in oriental countries for self-defense.

Name: Maxi-10
Description: LeRoi Maxi-10 is a French automatic pistol with an undeserved street reputation, built largely on its macho chunky styling and clever marketing.

Name: Arms Avenger
Description: The Militech Arms Avenger is a medium autopistol.The standard-issue sidearm of the United States Armed Forces, as well as the Lazarus Military Operations Group, the Militech Avenger has been the sidearm of the US Military since 2005. Although it lacks body armor penetration, it makes up for it with range and accuracy giving it a proven record as being a good firearm, it is issued mainly to rear-area officers and military police.

Name: Black Widow Flechette Pistol
Description: Militech Black Widow Flechette Pistol was designed under contract with the U.S. Air Force as a standard space sidearm, especially for EVATs (EVA Troops, the USAF Special Ops unit). The idea was to create the potential for a great deal of damage with low penetration/recoil for use in enclosed environments. Ammo feeds from a somewhat bulky 10-round dip.

Name: Silver Shadow Flechette Pistol
Description: The civilian ancestor of the famous "Black Widow" developed for the USAF.

Name: P-346
Description: A very comfortable sidearm from Militech. Popular among it's security officers as well as police and military. A professionals handgun through and through.

Name: .357 Magnum Autoloader
Description: Nomad .357 Magnum Autoloader is based on the Colt M1911, this pistol is sturdy and user-friendly. It uses a standard box magazine; reloading takes one round.

Name: .357 Magnum Revolver
Description: Nomad .357 Magnum Revolver is magnum pistol. The .357 Magnum cartridge is ideally suited for matched rifle and pistol use.

Name: C-823
Additional Info: Can be concealed without a check.
Description: A very well made compact from H&K, the built in laser sight definitely helps with the accuracy problems inherent to such a short barrel.

Name: "Defender" DEF-3 Pistol
Description: This is the standard handgun for all Argentinean military and police forces.

Name: "Ikarus" 432-J Pistol
Description: Police and federal agencies are fast becoming enamored with this masterfully crafted and elegant firearm.

Name: USP 25
Description: Heckler and Koch are always expanding on their USP series of weapons. This time they are taking it in a new direction. The action remains virtually the same, the clip however has been placed inside the grip, and the weapon chambered for 10 mm caseless. This makes the gun a bit smaller and more conceilable.

Name: NS-7
Description: H&K once again proves they are on top of their game. In addition, the unique styling and ergonomic feel makes this weapon more like an extension of your arm than a hunk of metal

Name: S-350 "Sturmer"
Description: Another extremely stylish pistol from H&K.

Name: "Tri-Star" Revolver
Description: S&W designed the Stein & Wasserman "Tri-Star" Revolver special-load revolver as a "compact yet practical multi-munitions delivery system." What this means in plain English is that the Tri-Star is a big, double-action, revolver style handgun which fires .410 shotgun ammo. The Tri-Star has seen a great deal of use in media entertainment.

Name: P-41 Autoloading Pistol
Description: Sternmeyer P-41 Autoloading Pistol aka Sternmeyer TYPE 41 Pistol is a lighter pistol common among IEC executives who want something a little easier to handle and with a greater magazine capacity than the hefty P-35.

Name: Luxus-41 Autoloading Pistol
Description: The german company has commercialized for its 20th birthday this luxury weapon, available with a golden, silver or platinum finish. Its technical stats are at the same level as more "professional" guns.

Name: St-2 Pistol
Description: Stolbovoy St-2 Pistol is medium pistol. Continuing Stolbovoy's tradition of extremely durable and reliable weapons, the St-2 is a handgun built with a composite slide and receiver and a patented action that virtually cleans itself of dust and grit. Uses cased ammo.

Name: Model-351 Gyrojet Pistol
Description: Texas Arms Model-351 Gyrojet Pistol aka (Texas Arms 351 Gryojet Pistol in Deep Space) is gryojet pistol. Developed as a lightweight gyrojet weapon along the lines of the earlier Mark II models of the 20th century, the 351 pistol fires a 9mm rocket round. Range is 3x that of a normal pistol in vacuum. The 351 is a commonly used military firearm, particularly on Luna, but is rarely seen Earth-side.

Name: Type-13 Police Pistol
Description: Towa Manufacturing Type-13 Pistol is standard autopistol for Japan's SDF soldiers. It also standard autopistol for Japanese patrol cops. NPA developed this gun to deal with an increase in foreign cybered criminals. Because it frequently kills or cripples non-cyber targets, the gun is feared by NPA officers as a "Blackmark Maker." On request from patrol officers, NPA began developing a non-lethal rubber bullet around 2018.

Name: Type-14 Police Pistol
Description: Towa Manufacturing Type-14 Police pistol is standard pistol for patrol cops. NPA developed this gun to deal with an increases in foreign cybered-up criminals. Because it frequently kills or cripples non-enhanced criminals, the gun is feared by NPA officers as a "Blackmark Maker." Upon request from patrol officers, NPA began developing a non-lethal rubber bullet around 2018. It also standard autopistol for Japan's SDF soldiers.

Name: Express Racegun
Description: Tsunami Express Racegun is pistol designed with the professional competitor in mind, the Express is a 5.2mm electrothermal design that gives the ammo capacity of a Minor class gun with the muzzle velocity and hitting power of the Major calibers. Ergonomic design, computer-controlled tolerances, a custom barrel compensator, and one of the best, most stable, rounds to come out of our munitions lab all combine with a Zeiss-Nikon COT scope to become one of the most accurate handguns on the market today. Perfect for the competitor who doesn't want to be slowed down by his sidearm.The Express isn't really designed to be concealable. Because of the barrel compensator's design, this gun cannot be fitted with a suppressor. The Express is a racegun, not a combat monster, and its design reflects that: lots of satin-polished chrome steel, real wood grips, 125lpi checkering on the grips and frontstrap. The battery is loaded into the back of the gun, under the partial slide; the magazine is in the pistol grip. The wood grips feature a wrist support and ergonomic design. COT scope is attached to the frame, ahead of the slide. There are three adjustable weights under the barrel in front. Overall length of the gun is 36cm.

Name: "Pengu" Pistol
Description: Popular with European military and police forces.

Name: VZ-120
Description: This Czech pistol, manufactured by Ceska Zbojovkain Prague, is the premier East European light service pistol. Imported by Ares America, it has been rated by several experts as the best pistol of its class in the world. The sidearm of choice of the Czech Mechanized Command.

Name: Mygal
Description: The Mygal is the service weapon of the American police, but unfortunately, it is too light to effectively protect the average beat cop ! It is best fitted for police detectives as well has private ones. Very attractive low price.

Name: AVP-11
Description: A common handgun, found worldwide. Extremely popular due to its low price.

Name: PPM-7
Description: A Malorian pistol with built in suppressor. A bit shiny for wet work, but it's a Malorian, so who's gonna complain.

Name: Fashion Gun 9
Description: Fashion Gun 9 is lightweight pistol, common to many of the Poser set. Emptying the magazine will cause the barrel shroud to melt and slough off the weapon like hot cheese. At this point, the gun jams permanently. (In game terms firing a full magazine load within 7 combat actions cause the gun to jam automatically.) The plastic is truly inferior, and inappropriate to the job it was used for but you get what you pay for though.

Name: Surprising Stranger
Description: Surprising Stranger is pistol four-shot, pepperbox design. One of the most reliable of the polymer one-shots.

Name: Teen Dreem
Description: Teen Dreem is ten-shot pistol with full auto capacity. Tends to melt under full autofire.

Name: Sci Fi Starrior 4
Description: Sci Fi Starrior 4 is polymer one-shot blaster copy model from a 20th century movie called Star Trek Wars.

Name: Magnum
Additional Info: Jam deals 2d6+1 damage to the user
Description: This plastic polymer is an imitation of the old Automag 44.

Name: Gangmaster
Additional Info: Retractable "bayonet" blade, damage : 1D6. The blade breaks or folds in result of a melee fumble.
Description: High caliber pistol that enjoys a certain popularity amongst street gangs.

Name: One Shot
Additional Info: 60% chance to explode on jam (4d6+1 to user)
Description: Espinoza One Shot is pistol. One shot, heavy caliber. Tends to explode.

Name: Heavy Flechette Pistol
Additional Info: Bio-link (Can only be used by registered owner)
Description: Malorian Arms Heavy Flechette Pistol is heavy flechette pistol. Firing a single 150 grain, 4mm dart at over 1700 feet per second, the Malorian Arms heavy flechette pistol is second to none in flechette handgun technology. Using a liquefied gas combustion system, this semiautomatic pistol packs a serious wallop in a handgun-sized package. The large magazine capacity makes this weapon a favorite with firepower freaks everywhere. Eran Malour has specifically designed his new flechette gun with the "enhanced" customer in mind. The weapon comes chipped from the factory, safety interlocked and encoded to the owner, so use by anyone else is impossible. This feature is a definite plus to anyone needing a strong home defense weapon, but who worries that children might hurt themselves with an accidental discharge.

Name: "Mark II"
Description: Mustang Arms "Mark II" is a powerful autoloader machined to very close tolerances. Using the latest computer-aided design techniques, the Mark II is ergonomically and technically advanced. It sports a 16.5cm barrel with a ported compensator, but its most unusual feature is the magazine: Although a standard 12-round clip is available, each Mark II comes with a 20-round"banana" mag. This handgun is popular with many police units for its "staying power"-that is to say, magazine capacity. Patrol officers commonly carry five twelve-round magazines of 11 mm AP, plus one up the spout; the banana clip is normally used by SWAT, entry teams, and military special-ops units.

Name: M-93V Lynx
Description: The most respected weapon manufacturers in Italy got together to release a custom anniversary limited run of the M-93. Chambered in 11 mm, this gun is maximized for accuracy and elegance. A true talking piece for wealthy executives. The solid gold accenting and custom barrel porting make this weapon one of the most prized in the world.

Name: DI-57 "Ferro"
Description: A very good quality pistol with a classy design. The extended magazine holds 21 cartridges.

Name: Model 338 Citygun
Description: Nova Model 338 Citygun is double-action revolver Citygun is Nova Arms' attempt to bring the revolver up to date. Rather than employing a traditional cylinder, it uses Nova's patented "Ammo Cassettes". These are disposable cylinders composed of superstrong composite ceramics preloaded with seven .338 Nova cartridges. To reload, one simply drops out the empty cassette and slaps in a fresh one, thus doing away with clumsy reloading of individual rounds.The Citygun is packed with modern features, sporting a nonreflective matte black finish, a octagonal barrel which has an underbarrel universal scope-mount, an adjustable trigger, and twin triple-porting on the barrel which serves as a sophisticated muzzle compensator. The most striking feature is the weapon's layout-the cylinder has been positioned in front of the trigger group, creating a straight-line barrel-arm sight picture, and giving the gun an almost autopistol look! Nova also includes two spare ammo cassettes with every Citygun. Durable, reliable, and capable of placing seven high-velocity slugs in a two-inch pattern as fast as you can pull the trigger, the Citygun is indisputably the most advanced wheelgun on the market today.

Name: Model 757 Cityhunter
Description: Nova Model 757 Cityhunter is pistol revolver. An unusual double-action design from Nova Arms, a company with a long-time fascination with futuristic revolvers. The Cityhunter can be classified as a revolver-almost. The Nova design strays from revolver conventions in several ways: the Cityhunter fires 11 mm caseless "trounds" (that is, each cartridge's bullet is embedded in a triangular propellant block).

Name: P-35
Description: The Sternmeyer P-35 aka Sternmeyer Type 35 is a heavy auto pistol. Rugged, reliable, with excellent stopping power. Another fine E.C.C. product from the United Germanies. The standard issue sidearm in many Euro-corp guard forces, and the pistol of choice among IEC executives

Name: Luxus-35
Description: The german company has commercialized for its 20th birthday this luxury weapon, available with a golden, silver or platinum finish. Its technical stats are at the same level as more "professional" guns.

Name: "Raimei" Ramjet Pistol
Description: Tsunami Arms "Raimei" Ramjet Pistol is ramjet pistol. Following close on the heels of our successful Ramjet Rifle is the Raimei (Thunderclap) pistol. Designed for urban combat against PA suits and 'borgs, the Raimei fires a slightly larger 10mm bullet; this design allows for faster acceleration to full speed, but a lower range to avoid damaging incidentals. The Raimei comes standard with a Maboroshi smartgun link or Zeiss-Nikon COT, plus security chipping to prevent unauthorized use.

Name: Glock-25 Pistol
Description: On par with other Glock pistols, the 25 has a modern and imposing look with a reliablility to match it. Used in Austria and certain African countries as a service pistol by the military and police.

Name: Bi-Power Handcannon
Description: Stein & Wasserman Bi-Power Handcannon is Pistol Revolver/Autoloader. After a long wait, Stein & Wasserman's "Bi-Power is now commercially available! Following a previously unheard-of design philosophy, this hybrid handgun mates a double-action .44 Magnum revolver to a .45 ACP autoloader. The automatic's long slide ends in a compensator, but (because it's built into the frame beneath the barrel of the automatic and ahead of the trigger assembly) the revolver's barrel is somewhat snubby.

Name: USP 68
Description: Pistol designed with special forces in mind.

Name: SX-45
Description: With the SX-45, H&K is delivering an upgraded version of the excellent Mk.23.

Name: "Fox" Dual Ammo Pistol
Additional Info: This weapon has two 10-round magazines, Each magazine can be loaded with a different ammunition type.

Name: E-TACK Public Defender
Additional Info: Built-In Smartgun Link, requires Subdermal Grip to fire. Has a lethal and non-lethal mode, user can switch at will. (Both modes use the same ammunition)

Name: CZ 105
Description: With it's its heavy barrel shroud acting as a counterweight against recoil, this is weapon is very accurate at driving it's 11 mm ammunition home.

Name: Overlord Handcannon
Additional Info: If used to threaten violence as part of a Facedown,the user adds +1 to the user’s Check unless the userrecognizes the Overlord and knows it is a crap gun.

Name: GunMart Special
Additional Info: Whenever you roll a Critical Failure (1) when firing the weapon, it destroys itself beyond repair.

Name: GunMart Smart Special
Additional Info: Whenever you roll a Critical Failure (1) when firing the weapon, it destroys itself beyond repair. Built-In Smartgun Link, if Smart Special is disarmed or otherwise pulled from the user's hands while plugged into their interface Plugs, the weapon is destroyed beyond repair.

Name: Hand Bolt Gun
Description: Normally for mechanical work, but in a pinch the bolt gun can be treated like firing a Heavy Pistol. Uses Light Bolt Ammo.

Name: P-237
Description: A nice handgun, comfortable in the hand with very negligible recoil and a nice ammo capacity. Arasaka has begun arming its forces in explosive locales with this firearm due to its large caliber. It has also gained a following in the professional community for its out of the box accuracy and reliability.

Name: "Mamoru" Heavy Pistol
Description: Arasaka ups the stakes with another heavy combat pistol. Sturdy and extremely reliable, reasonably accurate and best of all affordable. A little large for most, but at least no one will be asking if you "brought enough gun".

Name: "Machi" Pistol
Description: This is Quite possibly Arasaka's most popular handgun line in years. Favored by professionals and amatuers alike. With molded grips, this gun perfectly captures the look and feel of the street. Winner of "Solo Of Fortune's Gun of the Year Award" for 2020.

Name: "Yuyake" Hand Cannon
Description: Arasaka is the leading developer in 12 mm handguns, and as the threat of cybernetic crimes and augmented militaries becomes more prevalent its not hard to see why. The "Yuyake" is a beautiful gun, and does not disappoint in it's performance.

Name: Magnum
Description: Ameritech Magnum aka 454 Magnum (Revolver) is classy heavy revolver from Ameritech Arms, with steel-reinforced ceramic construction. Engineered for rapid target reacquisition, and capable of being laser-sighted or smartchipped. By special order only.

Name: Model 44
Description: The Armalite 44 is a very heavy autopistol. Designed as an alternate to the 1998 U.S. Army sidearm trials. A solid contender.

Name: Predator
Description: How can the best heavy pistol in the world work even better ? That's the question Ares Arms asked their R&D Department, and the Predator is their answer. Designed to fire state-of-the-art firepower 12 mm heavy pistol ammunition, the Predator packs a mighty punch. Combine it with the new 15-shot clip and optional Ares Smartgun Link (not included), and you've got a new contender for man's best friend.

Name: Predator GZ
Description: Determined to keep a name with good reputation, Ares has released this GZ version which is in fact nothing like its predecessor. The whole design of the weapon has been reviewed and greatly improved, as well as the price.

Name: AMT Model 2000
Description: The Colt AMT Model 2000, shortened to Colt AMT 2000 or M-2000, is a very heavy autopistol.Serving for over 20 years, including use in the first and second Central American Wars, the AMT 2000 continues to provide more capability of knocking down heavily armored foes. By 2019, field officers and vehicle crews were given the option of the AMT 2000 or the Alpha-Omega 10mm pistol, both of which are comparably more powerful than the 9mm ammunition used in the Avenger 9mm pistol, and by 2020, had become the standard officer's sidearm.

Name: Multi-Ammunition Pistol
Additional Info: Uses rifle Ammo (4d6 is non lethal)
Description: Constitution Arms Multi-Ammunition Pistol is revolver designed by Constitution Arms to take advantage of advances in the field of ordnance technology, this revolver is designed to offer the user a choice between lethal and non-lethal response to a situation. The standard model is equipped with a rapid selector switch (to select between rounds before firing) and a readout display under the rear sight, which informs the user of the round selected.Smartchipped models give the user direct control over selection, and round information is provided directly to the user. Being a revolver, it uses cased ammo.

Name: 454 DA "Super Chief"
Description: Federated Arms 454 DA "Super Chief" is pistol originally conceived with handgun hunters in mind, the Super Chief is a double-action revolver finished in stainless steel and chambered for the .454 Casull, a cutdown big-game cartridge specifically designed for large animals. A big success with people who like the challenge of handgun hunting, this weapon has also proven itself as a real manstopper when the situation warrants. It's also a very popular Nomad weapon.

Additional Info: Uses Rifle Ammo, Pre-installed Smartgun Link
Description: Malorian Arms 3516 is most powerful personal handgun on the market in the year 2020 manufactured by Malorian Arms, Eran Malour developed this radical new design to the personal specifications of famous rocker Johnny Silverhand. "I wanted something that would drop a cyberpsycho'ed fan at 100 paces, no matter how metalled up he was," explains the enigmatic singer. "Price was no object." Malorian's design employs a rare, solid Orbital titanium frame, custom Dyna-porting and a direct cyber interlink that locks the user's cyberarm in place as the weapon fires. By special order only

Name: .477 Boomer Buster
Description: Militech .477 Boomer Buster is a pistol. Now, a close-in support weapon that can stop a cyberpsycho cold; nearly an express rifle in design. A 4-chamber, pepperbox style gun, with a folding arm brace for support.

Name: "Perseus" Hand Cannon
Additional Info: If it was fired during the previous Round in a combat, it operates as a 2 ROF weapon instead of a 1 ROF weapon.

Name: .44 Magnum Revolver
Description: Nomad .44 Magnum Revolver aka .44MAG REVOLVER is a revolver. Usually carried by Nomads using the .44 lever-action rifle, it is based on the classic large-frame Smith & Wesson and Colt revolvers. Uses cased ammo.

Name: Spitfire Battle Pistol
Description: Royal Enfield Ordnance Spitfire battle pistol is a high quality long-slide counter-balanced military pistol designed to replace the aging Browning automatic. Using composite plastics and ceramics, the Enfield factory has managed to produce a smartchipped high-capacity 12mm pistol of unrivalled accuracy for its class. The SAS and SBS versions of this pistol have been further modified to allow "double-tapping" of a target (ROF 2).

Name: BA-5 "Elite Wingman"
Additional Info: Specially Modified version for Argus Unlimited

Name: 454 Magnum Disposable
Description: 454 Magnum Disposable is deadliest of the polymer holdouts. Famed for its reliability (and rarity). A pull tab opens the over/under barrels and activates the permanently-sealed battery. Uses electrically-fired caseless ammo; non-reloadable. Made from reinforced carbon fiber composites.

Name: Timeless WW1 Rifle to Pistol Conversion "Obreaze"
Additional Info: In between each shot, an Action must be spent to work the bolt and chamber the next round.

Name: Tech-Assault
Description: Federated Arms Tech-Assault is thirty-shot SMG with full-auto capacity.

Name: Tech-Assault II
Description: Federated Arms Tech-Assault II is an updated version of the venerable Tech-Assault I, features larger clip, and better autofire.

Name: MPK-9
Description: Heckler & Koch MPK-9 is light composite submachinegun with high quality sights. Used by many Eurosolos. The industry mainstay.

Name: Mini-Gat Machine Carbine
Description: Militech Mini-Gat Machine Carbine is the .22cal caseless (5mm) has never been taken seriously as a defensive round until now. The Mini-Gat is a 5mm five barrel gatling gun capable of emptying its helical magazine in under five seconds flat! Don't be satisfied with some machine pistol's dinky thirty-round clip when a Mini-Gat carries one hundred and twenty rounds! It's electronically fired, operating from a rechargeable battery in the magazine.

Name: SMG-12
Additional Info: Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire, Can be concealed without a skill check.

Name: "PMS" Sub-Machine Gun
Description: Setsuko-Arasaka "PMS" Sub-Machine Gun is a submachine gun produced by Setsuko-Arasaka (a division of the parent company) now produces their Police/Military/Security SMG in the United States at their new, automated Night City plant. Designed for low-profile corporate security and paramilitary forces where discretion is valued over raw firepower, the weapon fires a subsonic, caseless 7mm bullet paired with a built-in Sonex suppressor.Early models of this weapon gained the reputation of being fussy about ammo, and rumors surfaced that the weapon interface caused peripheral vision hallucinations. These problems were due to subcontractors substituting inferior or non-spec parts. The new PMS has been put through exhaustive testing to overcome all earlier problems.

Name: Machine Pistol
Description: Suranam Machine Pistol is Korean-made "minisub," or mini-submachinegun fires the .177-caliber explosive caseless cartridge. It is made of carbon plastics, has a folding wire stock, and due to the small ammo size, the magazine can hold a very large number of rounds. Thanks to a small explosive charge which causes high bullet expansion, the ammunition is efficient, but the weapon's high rate of fire often causes severe overheating problems. The Suranam is a common choice for cyberarm weapon installation.

Name: Uzi Miniauto 9
Description: Uzi's entry into the 21st century, all plastic, with a rotary electric clip and adjustable trigger. The choice for many security Solos.

Name: PPsh 14
Description: A small SMG used by civilians, which fire an old bullet of the last century. The quality/price ratio is acceptable, if nether the accuracy, or the stopping power are important.

Name: WMA "Minami 10"
Description: The Arasaka WMA "Minami 10" is a submachine gun.The standard Arasaka Security weapon, found worldwide. A good all-around weapon.

Name: AASW-9F
Description: A simple submachine gun, common to security forces all over the world, both private and federal. Sleek clean lines are all that distinguish this weapon from the vast multitude of other 9 mm subs around the globe.

Name: "Arashi" Submachinegun
Description: An original design of this weapon makes it hardly larger than a pistol.

Name: HJKE-11 "Yukimura"
Additional Info: Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire, built in smartlink.

Name: 10 Submachine Gun
Description: Militech 10 Submachine Gun is submachine gun created using composite plastics and the most modern computer machining techniques to create a submachine gun that is light, accurate, and a pleasure to shoot. Available in two calibers: 10mm PlasticCase and the venerable .45 ACP. Factory accessories include sound suppressor, scope mounts, grenade launcher and interchangeable caliber kits allowing a wide choice of firepower. And Militech doesn't forget the fashion conscious, with a choice of eight designer colors (red, blue, green, black, silver, camo, gold, gray).

Name: Viper Submachine Gun
Description: The Militech Viper Submachinegun is the standard issue sub-machinegun for those Lazarus troops who don't use assault rifles. Typically used by airborne noncoms and by special ops troops who need a powerful, silenceable weapon. The silencer is an extra 150eb, and subtracts 1 from the weapon's accuracy. When the silencer is used firing is still audible, but the sound is greatly reduced and carries less.

Name: 1010 Machine Pistol
Description: Beretta 1010 Machine Pistol is machine pistol. This model is a highly compact machine pistol designed for undercover security work and protection duties. In its basic form, the Beretta is somewhat inaccurate, but with the addition of either a laser or smart-rig it becomes ideal for its chosen role. Compact and thin, it produces no unsightly bulge in your designer suit when you're out escorting your employer. For further compactness a smaller magazine can be fitted (15 rounds) and the barrel shroud removed. This has the effect of lowering concealability to a large pocket: rating P (how large a pocket, the referee can decide)

Name: M-24 Advanced Submachine Gun
Description: Beretta M-24 Advanced Submachine gun is new standard-issue SMG for Interpol. Beretta Euroarms has set new standards in weapon technology with their M-24 submachine gun. Using the time-proven M-12 SMG as the basis for this new weapon, they incorporate features such as an integral smart link, large magazine capacity, and a recoil compensator. The latest version, new for 2020, is the PM-24S.

Name: 93A Ronin
Description: Modernised and automatic version of the famous 93R.

Name: 102-SR
Description: Beautifully crafted and the additional weight provided by the oversized, but ergonomic, foregrip makes recoil almost imperceptible, even when firing one handed.

Name: MP-2013
Description: Heckler & Koch MP-2013 is updated submachine gun of the MP-5K classic, with compound plastics and integral silencing

Name: MP5 TX
Description: Adapting the MP5K series models to the 10 mm CL round, Heckler & Koch has come up with another winner with the MP5 TX. Voted favorite new weapon at the Paris Arms Show last year, the MP5 TX is a sure winner by any standards.

Name: MP7S
Description: Newer version of the H&K MP7, comes with a built-in Suppressor.

Name: "Gamdaii"
Description: IMI "Gamdaii" is a dual-feed 10mm caseless SMG. Intended to supplant current assault weapons for Mossad units, this weapon system is of high quality and fine machining. The gun feeds from twin magazine, allowing different types of ammo to be loaded. Ammo selection is via thumb-operated lever. Like most IMI weapons, the Gamdaii is easily modified for left or right-handed use.

Name: ARS-11
Description: While IMI is tossing out their old look, it appears as though Sternmeyer is picking it out of the trash and recycling it for themselves. The simple folding stock can get a bit persnickety, but it is easily removed.

Name: Luxus ARS-11
Description: The german company has commercialized for its 20th birthday this luxury weapon, available with a golden, silver or platinum finish. Its technical stats are at the same level as more "professional" guns.

Name: ARS-5C Submachine Gun
Description: Mustang Arms ARS-5C Submachine gun is current model submachinegun. Like the Enforcement 10, it is fashioned mostly from the advanced ceramic Sortex™, and is available in matte black, blued, marine stainless and camouflage finishes. It is a new system for the young company, gaining popularity among law enforcement agencies and corporate armies. The ARS fires single shots, and fully automatically at a punishing rate. The ARS is available with full and collapsible stocks, and with a variety of accessories including detachable scopes (+2 to single shots, only when aiming), laser designators (+1), and silencers (Awareness roll to hear). 650eb camouflaged, + 100eb for scope, +100eb for laser designator, +50eb for silencer.

Name: StS Submachine Gun
Description: Stolbovoy StS Submachinegun is last item in Stolbovoy's line of basic weapons, the StS submachinegun also incorporates the company's unique designs, and is one of the finest submachineguns around. Available with collapsible or fixed stocks. Comes with iron sights, but can be fitted with a variety of aiming systems. Uses cased ammo.

Name: SVH-10 "Hurricane"
Description: This SMG is close to a machine gun thanks to a very high rate of fire and a large helical magazine located under a hood at the rear.

Name: "Pepper Shaker"
Additional Info: Can only Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire (Uses 6 bullets instead of 10)

Name: FP3-K
Description: SMG strongly inspired by the famous MP5K. It sells well in nomad communities thanks to its mean look.

Name: M-7 Submachinegun
Description: The Indo-chinese firm has always sold cheap weapons for third world countries. It is without surprise that the M-7 has flooded the market. It's a submachine gun made of 70% polymer, with the general shape of early last century weapons, which has very average characteristics, and a significant rate of jamming. But for that price who can ask for more ?

Name: CP-1120
Description: This weapon. although poorly made, sells very well due to its very low cost. Its only real feature is its built in suppressor. This is a very common weapon found in the hands of pirates, gangs, and other groups whose priorities value low expense over quality.

Name: "Big Dreem"
Additional Info: Only capable of Autofire (3), Autofire stops when ammo runs out.

Name: "Sten"
Description: "Sten" is a generic Nomad term for any homemade/modified submachine gun, in honor of the original Sten gun. The stats given are for a typical example, but they range from very reliable to almost-certain-to-blow-off-a-shooter's-hands. They are available in several different configurations.

Name: "Volt" Electric Submachine Gun
Additional Info: Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire, 50% chance to break on Jam.

Name: TKI-20 "Shingen"
Additional Info: Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire, Built-in smartlink, uses <Smart Heavy Handgun Ammunition>

Name: M32 "Fenrir"
Additional Info: Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire, Built-in smartlink, uses <Smart Heavy Handgun Ammunition>

Name: Tuzi-7
Description: CCMMC Tuzi-7 is heavy submachine gun used by the army (and favored by cheap hoods) for fighting in confined spaces. Semi-auto/full auto switch standard.

Name: City Reaper
Description: Chadran Arms City Reaper is dual-barrel, over-under weapon system carried by urban-deployed IPC troops.

Name: MPK-11
Description: Heckler & Koch MPK-11 is submachine gun. Possibly the most used Solo's gun in existence, the MPK-11 can be modified into three different designs, including a bullpup configuration, standard SMG, an assault carbine.

Name: MPK-2020 SMG
Description: Heckler & Koch MPK-2020 SMG is submachine gun descendant of the MP5 and the G3 assault rifle. About five years ago, special forces units in Europe were looking for a replacement for their main short-range assault weapons. After detailed discussion with such units as GSG-9, the SAS, GIGN and Corporate strike teams like Dieter Kaufmann's Taktischekampf Einheit O, H&K produced a caseless 12mm laser- or smartchipped assault carbine. Slightly longer than the MP5, the MPK 2020 is compact enough to be carried in a thigh or long shoulder holster. Its 60-round magazine is deemed large enough for an initial attack without having to worry about reloading. Uncommon outside of Europe, this weapon is now a mainstay of anti-terrorist and special forces units in the EuroTheater

Name: C22-Z
Description: When Dai Lung decides to copy a competitor, he doesn't do things halfway ! In addition to strongly resembling the Seburo C-X, it practically takes the name of one of the other products of the Japanese firm. Nevertheless in spite of a successful design, one can hardly expect much from a weapon at such a price.

Name: C-XT
Description: Why search a better design when you already have the best ? Seburo has well understood that and reworked his famous C-X to change it into an excellent sub-machine gun equiped with an integrated silencer.

Name: MAC 14
Description: Ingram MAC 14 is an updated MAC-10, with composite body and cylindrical-feeding magazine.

Name: SMG-21
Description: Sternmeyer SMG-21 is submachine gun Sternmeyer's best entry in the anti-terrorist category, with wide use on C-SWAT teams and PsychoSquads. A heavy duty SMG with a collapsible stock and rugged construction for use in adverse conditions. The standard issue SMG for IEC security guards and IEC Army noncoms. Capable of firing in single shot from a closed bolt for accuracy or in full auto from open bolt for firepower. Unlike other open bolt designs, such as the Minami, the Sternmeyer does not have a fixed firing pin. The gun also has mountings for an optical sight for use in the single shot mode. A tough and versatile weapon at a good price.

Name: ST-5u Submachine Gun
Additional Info: Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire, 50% chance to ignore jam (1d2 to see if it fires which clears the jam, if it fails jam is cleared anyway)

Name: D51 "Pulsar"
Additional Info: Autofire (3) + Suppressive Fire, Can't Reload, breaks after firing all bullets.

Name: WCAA "Rapid Assault Shot 12"
Description: The Arasaka WCAA "Rapid Assault Shot 12" is a shotgun. A high-powered auto-shotgun with lethal firepower. Used by Arasaka worldwide.

Name: Qi-15
Description: CCMMC Qi-15 is the assault shotgun favored by the PLA and Public Security for quelling riots.

Name: Hurricane Assault Weapon
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell, Requires 11+ Body to fire unless it is mounted.
Description: Constitution Arms Hurricane Assault Weapon is a 12-Gauge Magnum that utilizes a dual reciprocating barrel action to minimize heat problems. Equipped with a forty-round saddle drum magazine, plus hydro-shock recoil compensation (mounted in the stock). Designed initially for urban police units requiring an extreme-force weapon against street violence and crowd control. However, the use of this weapon has come to the attention of many Max-Tac units, who see the smartchipped version as a perfect anti-cyberpsycho system.

Name: Last Chance
Description: Enfield-Ubichi LastChance is polymer one shot shotgun. A dangerous and depressingly popular variation on the polymer one-shot: a fiberglass tube, 45cm long, containing little more than a shell and a spring-loaded firing mechanism. Beloved of all sorts of hoodlums, lowlifes and hitmen.

Name: P.16
Description: Luigi Franchi P.16 is a short and stubby auto shotgun, generally used for security work and marketed as a "restraint rifle" since it can also fire incapacitating baton rounds and gas shells.

Name: "King Buck" Multi-Magnum
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell + Fires 4 slugs at once
Description: Luigi Franchi "King Buck" Mulit-Magnum is a Italian-made four-barreled pepperbox-style shotgun, made for hunting big game. It has four separate barrels and chambers and they are fired all at once.. A huge, unusual and exceptionally heavy weapon (7 kilos), which is considered a collector's item.

Name: Warhammer Assault Shotgun
Description: MetaCorp Warhammer™ Assault Shotgun is shotgun created formerly by Pancor was a small company built on one excellent product: the Pancor Jackhammer. The Jackhammer was a revolutionary weapon in many ways-advanced materials technology, rotary action, and barrel stabilization were just some of its features. Unfortunately, the military was not interested. When the Collapse came, Pancor was one of the companies destroyed by it The weapon (except for a few hundred owned by police, special-ops units, and survivalists) disappeared. When Meta Corporation was formed in 2012, one of the techs from Pancor (who had been deployed to SouthAm with other Meta personnel) reapplied for a patent. The patent was approved, and the Warhammer, an improved version of the Jackhammer, was released in 2016.The Warhammer sports a larger mag capacity, more efficient cerametal barrel, and optional smartchipping. These improvements are complemented by a wide range of ammunition types, giving the weapon impressive tactical versatility.

Name: Buldog Compact Assault SHotgun
Description: The Militech Bulldog is a compact, twelve-gauge, selective fire shotgun, utilizing a twenty-one round curved magazine. It was designed to fill the void left by the lack of easily controllable auto-shotguns, and uses a proprietary system of gas porting and spring compensation to reduce recoil. It also has an integral laser sight, which uses a diffraction scanner to draw a circle of bright red light equivalent to the pattern size at the impact point. For grenade and slug use, the laser may be tightened down to a narrow beam. The beam is also adjustable for different loads and barrel chokes. The gun fires single shots.

Name: Crusher SSG
Description: The Militech Crusher is a family of stockless short barrel weapons developed by the Militech Corporation.

Name: Military/Police Shotgun
Description: Militech Military/Police Shotgun is a gas-operated, semi-auto shotgun with an eight-round detachable box magazine and folding stock. A hard-working weapon for the hard-working corporate MP.

Name: Close-Control 20
Description: Mustang Arms Close-Control 20 is utilitarian shotgun comes from the Night City-based firm Mustang Arms. Composed of lightweight composite materials, the C-C 20 is designed as a reliable antipersonnel weapon which won't devastate an enclosed area. The Close-Control 20 is a semiauto 20-Gauge bullpup. Its clear plastic box magazine holds 15 rounds, and the entire weapon is only 66cm in length.

Name: "Raider" Riot Shotgun
Description: Mustang Arms "Raider" Riot Shotgun is a standard design semi-automatic 12-gauge shotgun. It feeds from a five-round tube magazine and operates on blowback. The barrel, receiver and magazine are steel; the stock and forearm are matte black Sortex.The Raider is available in camo finishes, and in a stainless marine version. The Raider uses an old-fashioned tube magazine, but it does have one innovation: The magazine can load one shell at a time from the bottom of the receiver like a conventional shotgun, or the entire tube can be ditched and replaced in a matter of seconds. The tubes are somewhat awkward to carry, but they are valuable in a crisis.

Name: Stakeout 10
Description: Sternmeyer Stakeout 10 is light duty stakeout shotgun, used by city police departments and IEC security forces

Name: 1216 Tactical
Additional Info: Smart Gun. Shotgun Shell, has 4 different magazines that require interface plugs and subdermal grip to work, 2 turns to reload.

Name: "Ragnarok" Close Assault Weapon
Description: Tsunami Arms "Ragnarok" Close Assault Weapon is shotgun uses special Electrothermal Ammo Enhancement, combined with a dual reciprocating-barrel action and hydroshock recoil compensation (see Constitution Arms Hurricane). The batteries are set on the stock; up to five can be mounted. This has been designed for the 2021 SDF arms trials, but the Tokyo C-SWAT already has a couple.

Name: DB-2 Satara
Additional Info: Only Shotgun Slugs, 2 slugs per shot, ignores cover.

Name: Heavy Bolt Gun
Additional Info: Normally for mechanical work, but in a pinch the bolt gun can be treated like firing a shotgun with a single slug round. Uses Heavy Bolt Ammo.

Name: EVA-108 "Icepick"
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell, Designed for destroying ice on ship hulls, Works only in Vacuum

Name: MA-149 EVA Combat Shotgun
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell, Works only in Vacuum

Name: Hades Multipurpose Assault Shotgun
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell, Can load 5 different shotgun shell kinds.

Name: TechHammer
Additional Info: Shotgun Slugs, Under-barrel Smart Rocket Launcher (Holds 1 Smart rocket, uses special ammo)

Name: Beast Shotgun
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell, Firing this weapon without suffering the Broken Arm Critical Injury Rrequires BODY 10 or higher unless it is mounted.

Name: S-TACK Public Defender
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell, Has a lethal and non-lethal mode, user can switch at will. (Both modes use the same ammunition)

Name: Bubba Buster
Additional Info: Shotgun Shell, If it fires 3 times in 1 minute (20 rounds of combat) the barrel melts and destroys the weapon.

Name: Military M-12 Close Assault Weapon
Description: Military M-12 Close Assault Weapon is shotgun. "Close Assault Weapon" is a military euphemism for shotgun. Formerly outlawed by the now-extinct Geneva Convention, combat shotguns are common sights in 2020.

Name: Heavy Bolt Gun
Additional Info: Normally for mechanical work, but in a pinch the bolt gun can be treated like firing a shotgun with a single slug round. Uses Heavy Bolt Ammo.

Name: AKR-20 Medium Assault
Description: AKR-20 Medium Assault is a plastic and carbon-fiber update of the AKM, distributed throughout the remains of the Soviet Bloc. Uses cased ammo.

Name: A-80 Heavy Assault Rifle
Description: Kalashnikov A-80 Heavy Assault Rifle is another Soviet retread, with improved sighting and lightened construction via composites.

Name: "Nowaki" Assault Weapon
Additional Info: Burst (2 (Uses 3 bullets)) + Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Cannot do Single shot.

Name: "Masamune" Assault Weapon
Additional Info: Consuming 3 rounds every Attack, ablates armor by 2 instead of 1. Cannot do Single shot.

Name: WAA Bullpup Assault Weapon
Description: The Arasaka WAA Bullpup Assault Weapon is an assault rifle.A typical bullpup assault rifle. Like all Arasaka weapons, it is tough and reliable.

Name: Jinhua M-9
Description: CCMMC Jinhua M-9[1] aka CCMMC Jinhua M-7 is an assault rifle along the lines of the Militech Ronin M-20, but with bigger bullets and not as reliable. Identifiable by the gold flower on the stock, this is the standard rifle of the PLA.

Name: Jungle Reaper
Description: Chadran Arms Jungle Reaper is a dual-barrel, over-under weapon system carried by IPC field troopers.

Name: M-18 Assault Weapon
Description: Colt M-18 Assault Weapon is Colt Firearms' latest full-sized assault weapon, and the third item in their new full-spectrum personal weapons line.Colt has been hurting since the U.S. Armed Forces abandoned the .45 Auto and the M-16 for Beretta, FN, and, later, Militech weapons systems.The new line is Colt's bid to regain its stature as a military weapons supplier, and the bulwark of this line is the M-18 rifle. The M-18 is a bullpup-configuration weapon chambered for the common 5.56mm round. It fires single shots, and fully automatically. Like the other weapons in the line, the M-18 is fashioned from matte black Sortex. Camouflage finishes are available as well.

Name: M-9 Assault Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Barrel melts on critical failure.
Description: Darra-Polytechnic M-9 Assault Rifle is the first assault rifle using a caseless cartridge built entirely in the Hindu-Chinese Confederation. Designed to use the 5.5mm caseless (Chinese), this weapon's lineage is clearly Kalashnikov. Ballistic qualities are similar to the early Soviet 5.45mm used in the AK-74 assault rifle. Two things are readily apparent when you first pick up this weapon. The first is the lack of interfacing for the shooter. This weapon is designed for military forces in the Third World who don't fit their soldiers with chips and plugs. Second is the old-fashioned configuration in an age where bullpups are the style. Side-folding stock and a 1.2x optical sight are standard options on the weapon. Because of the large numbers of these guns exported out of the Hong Kong trade zone, and their very low cost, the M-9 has become a common sight in the Third World and on the streets.

Name: FN-RAL Heavy Assault Rifle
Description: The FN-RAL features a bullpup design and a collapsing stock. The assault rifle fires 7.62x51mm ammunition with a capacity of 30 rounds that it can empty in 3.2 seconds. It has a maximum range of 400 meters. It is known for its reliability, and can be commonly found in most sports & guns stores and on the street for an average cost of 660eb. Due to its size, it cannot be concealed on an individual.

Name: Light Assault 15
Description: Federated Arms Light Assault 15 is Federated's bid for the plastic-frame, bullpup-configured, caseless market pioneered by H&K's G-11/12 and Sternmeyer's M-95A. As with all Federated products, this is a durable light rifle, with good accuracy and a low price. You can expect the LA-15 to give Darra Polytechnic's M-9 a run for the money in the Third World arena.

Name: M-2012
Description: The good reliability, easily rechambered for other common round types. This weapon is chambered for a proprietary Argentine cartridge. Adaptability may be a selling point for this rifle. Equipped with a Knopfler & Konig 2x laser reflex scope standard.

Name: Dragon Light Assault Weapon
Description: The Militech Dragon Light Assault Weapon is the standard Lazarus Group paratroop weapon, a light bullpup rifle chambered for the new 6.5mm round. It does not have a collapsing stock, but its compact design and light weight make it a practical weapon for airborne troops. The light weight of the hybrid 6.5mm cartridge means that paratroops can carry a large amount of ammunition on drops. It is designed to complement the Mk IV, and uses many of the same parts, including the sight, magazines, bolt and bolt carrier.

Name: M-31a1 Advanced Infantry Combat Weapon
Description: Militech M-31a1 Advanced Infantry Combat Weapon is assault rifle. Two years ago, the Provisional United States government proposed a new competition to select an advanced infantry combat weapon. The armed services committee felt that the military had a fine weapon already, and decided to create an impossible set of design parameters to purposely set this weapon program back at least ten years. The first and only entrant in the competition was the M-31a1.

Name: MK IV Assault Weapon
Description: The Militech Mk IV Assault Weapon is a potent, heavy duty, bullpup assault weapon only recently introduced to the Militech Catalogue. Its recoil compensation system, and excellent design and balancing make it among the most controllable weapons available. It has recently become the standard issue weapon for all Lazarus non-airborne infantry units. It is also the standard issue rifle for U.S. infantry troops, complementing the Sternmeyer CG-13B, in service with special units, and the M-31al AICW just completing trials. The Mk IV is based on the old Mk III design (therefore Revised), and chambers the new hybrid 6.5mm round

Name: Ronin Light Assault
Description: The Ronin fires 5.56mm ammunition with a capacity of 25 rounds. It can fire 30 rounds in 3.2 seconds. It has a maximum range of 400 meters. It is known to be very reliable, and can be commonly found in most sports & guns stores and on the street for an average cost of 450eb. Due to its size, it cannot be concealed on an individual.

Name: Ronin Heavy Assault
Description: Heavily Modified version of Ronin Light Assault (Different Barrel, Mag)

Name: M95A4 Assault Weapon
Description: Sternmeyer M-95A4 (CG-13B) Assault Weapon is highly reliable, well-made plastic composite assault rifle. This is an advanced weapon firing a caseless 5.56mm round.It has seen limited service in special contingents of the U.S. Armed Forces and EC Defense Forces. IEC is the only corporation using this weapon in significant numbers. Refinements to the M-95A/CG-13A series for improved military applications and release as the A4/13B model include a tougher body, modular sight system, improved heat dispersal system and true magazines instead of the old disposable box pour-in system. Magazines for the A4 resemble the old G-11 boxes, but instead of merely storing ammo, the entire box slides into the receiver over the barrel. It makes for a little more susceptibility to contamination from dirt, but it also makes reloading easier and quicker under combat situations. The magazines are high-impact plastic and disposable. The modular sight system allows quick changing from telescopic to powered optical to laser sights without tools.

Name: M-02 Heavy Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Fires <Sternmeyer Tround Ammunition>

Name: M-04 Variable Assault
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Underbarrel Grenade Launcher (Holds 2 grenades), When one mode of the weapon jams neither mode can be used until an Action is taken to reverse the malfunction. Despite being an Exotic Weapon,the Grenade Launcher portion of this weapon can still fire Non-Basicgrenades.

Name: STS Hunting Rifle
Additional Info: Only capable of firing Expansive Rifle Ammunition

Name: St-5 Assault Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, 50% chance to ignore jam (1d2 to see if it fires which clears the jam, if it fails jam is cleared anyway)
Description: Stolbovoy St-5 Assault Rifle is light, sturdy bullpup weapon, the St-5 was designed to withstand the rugged environmental conditions in the Soviet Union. Using innovative design and special lubricants, Stolbovoy has created a weapon that can operate reliably under the most adverse conditions, including heat, cold, mud, dampness, sand and grit, lubricant contamination, and corrosive environments. One of the toughest, most reliable assault rifles in the world; troops are quoted as saying, "It never breaks!" Comes with iron sights, but can be scoped. In long and short barreled versions. Uses cased ammo.

Name: St-80M Assault Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, 50% chance to ignore jam (1d2 to see if it fires which clears the jam, if it fails jam is cleared anyway)

Name: Type-20 Advanced Infantry Combat Weapon
Description: Towa Manufacturing Type-20 Advanced Infantry Combat Weapon is the latest Towa assault rifle of the SDF.

Name: Type-99 Assault Rifle
Description: The Towa Manufacturing Type 99 assault rifle which is one of the most well known gun from the company. The standard assault rifle for the SDF since 1999.

Name: CAR-3 Assault Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Built-in underbarrel shotgun (1/1)

Name: "Odin" Battle Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Uses <Odin Rifle Ammunition>

Name: L-TACK Public Defender
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Has a lethal and non-lethal mode, user can switch at will. (Both modes use the same ammunition)

Name: "Sport-Master"
Additional Info: Only capable of firing Small Game Ammunition

Name: "Survival-Master"
Additional Info: Concealable once disassembled, disassembly takes 1 minute.

Name: "Superchrome" Glam Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, +2 Wardrobe and Style Skill Checks.

Name: RA-166 Elite Operations Assault Rifle
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Specifically designed for Argus Security.

Name: "Flatline"
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, 50% chance to break on jam.

Name: "Crowd Control"
Additional Info: Autofire (6 (1d6+1)) + Suppressive Fire, Can only Autofire

Name: MG-6 "One-on-One"
Additional Info: Autofire (6 (Uses 50 bullets for Autofire)) + Suppressive Fire

Name: BMG-500
Additional Info: Autofire (4) + Suppressive Fire, Uses Rifle Ammunition

Name: M2A5HB Browning .50
Additional Info: Autofire (6 (3d6)) + Suppressive Fire, Requires 11+ Body to use Unbraced.

Name: 14.5mm Machinegun
Additional Info: Autofire (6 (3d6)) + Suppressive Fire, Requires 11+ Body to use Unbraced.

Name: WSSA Sniper System
Description: Arasaka WSSA Sniper System is sniper rifle designed for urban-deployed corporate enforcement teams, the heavy-barreled, semi-auto Arasaka WSSA has a 40-round helical mag of saboted 3.5mm Frag-Flechettes, and is equipped with a silencer, flash suppressor and a Zeiss 12x scope with computer-enhanced laser sighting. With a loaded weight of 3.8kg, this is becoming a very popular sniper weapon.

Name: M-90 Sniper rifle
Description: Barrett M-90 Sniper Rifle is one of the world's heaviest sniper rifles, this is a development of the old Barrett BMG rifle. It fires accurized .50 caliber rounds, and is useless without a scope.

Name: F6
Description: FR-F6 is modern French sniper's rifle, with bipod, computer-assisted laser scope and a sound suppressor.

Name: Gyro-Sniper Rifle
Description: Remington Gryo-Sniper Rifle is gyro sniper rifle. A development of the gyro-rocket system initially proposed by Hughes and Militech in 2008, the Remington Gyro-Sniper fires a rocket-propelled, gyrostabilized shell. Through the use of advanced sensor technology, the shell homes in on the weapon's laser designator. The designator's integral range-finding computer determines such factors as wind speed/direction, distance to target, etc., then vectors the shell toward the intended target. lowlite and infrared capabilities are built in. The incredible stopping power (and long range) of the Gyro has earned it the nickname "Zeus' lightning" among police and Max-Tac snipers.

Name: M-70 Sniper Rifle
Description: A 7.62mm Bolt-Action Rifle is fourth or fifth-generation copy of original Winchester and Remington designs, this is a time-tested survivor of the 20th century, differing very little from its predecessors. These modern versions use weatherproof, long-wearing plastics and ceramics in their construction. Examples include the M-70 sniper rifles used by the U.S. Army and Marine Corps before the Collapse. Uses cased ammo.

Name: Type-00-Kai
Description: This Towa sniper rifle is a redesigned version of the Type 00 Sniper Rifle, used mainly by the SDF and Japanese Police SWAT teams since 2000. Uses cased ammo for Electrothermal Ammo Enhancement.

Name: Light-20
Description: The Barrett-Arasaka Light-20 is a sniper rifle (heavy weapon).The cyberpsycho hunter's favorite. Almost 2 meters long, this "cannon" fires a depleted uranium shell at supersonic speeds.[1] Guaranteed to drop a metalhead at 50 meters. long-range sniping weapon common to special ops teams. Also known as the Type-13 Heavy Sniper Rifle to the Japanese Police/SDF.

Name: 15mm "Long Rifle"
Description: Nomad 15mm "Long Rifle" is sniper rifle. Although the adoption of the 15mm BMG round (to replace the antique .50 cal) in the mid-1980s was never fully implemented (except in Europe), there were a number of weapons developed to jump on the 15mm bandwagon. The Collapse brought down most of these developers. A few years later, the Aldecaldos came across an old factory while salvaging back east. Hundreds of examples of 15mm BMG weapons had been tested or designed there, and all the tools and equipment were present to manufacture them- so the Aldecaldos did. Now most nomads use the 15mm BMG for anti-vehicle and sniping work.The media have taken to calling them Nomad Long Rifles, or even Kentucky Rifles. These weapons are huge and heavy, but when emplaced on a hill, they allow combat at a distance-something Nomads prefer. The most common version includes a scope mount with a 10x optical scope and lowlight, muzzle brake, flash hider, solenoid trigger, bipod, and custom furniture, and can be disassembled into three component parts (stock, action, barrel).

Name: Anti-Pilot Rifle "Krab"
Additional Info: Explodes (6d6 damage to user) on Jam.

Name: Enviro-Laucher
Additional Info: Cannot be reloaded, decomposes in 1 hour once used up.

Name: "Mosquito" Compound Bow
Additional Info: Works in Vacuum, Uses Special Arrows.

Name: "Survivalist"
Additional Info: <Combination Weapon> Crossbow mode 3d6/1 arrow, Assault Rifle mode 5d6/10 bullets (Uses Archery skill for both)

Name: Mobile Point Defense System
Additional Info: Can be remotely controlled (Computer/Cyberdeck) or set on automatic defense. Autofire (5) + Suppressive Fire only.

Name: "Nauseator" Riot-Control Device
Additional Info: DV 21 Resist Torture/Drugs or throw up for 5 minutes.

Name: WXA Computer-Aimed Weapon
Additional Info: Can only be remotely controlled (Computer/Cyberdeck), Autofire (5) + Suppressive Fire only.

Name: Dragon
Additional Info: The ignition must be activated 1 combat round before firing. It creates a 4m flame doing 2D6 spread over 2 random body areas the first round, then 1D6 to 1 area the second round. Only hard armor, or soft armors of SP15+, will protect the target. All soft armors will be damaged 2 SP instead of 1.

Name: Electronics Laser Cannon
Additional Info: 5d6 if SP = 14 or lower, 1d6 if SP = 15 or higher. Ignores 2/3 of SP

Name: "Cowboy" U-56 Grenade Launcher
Additional Info: Reload = 2 Actions, Requires 11+ Body to fire unless it is mounted.

Name: "Lance" Mini-Missile
Additional Info: Can't Reload, Heat Seeking Missiles. Uses INT instead of REF for hit chance.

Name: Liquid Propellant Assault Rifle LPA1
Description: Royal Enfield Ordnance Liquid Propellant Assault Rifle LPA1 is a twin-magazine, liquid-propellant, variable-velocity assault rifle. Designed as a multi-role small arms weapon system, it is now entering limited test service with the BCF. The LPA 1 is laid out in the traditional bullpup configuration with the liquid propellant stored in a self-sealing armored cassette in the butt The twin helical magazines are situated on either side of the receiver.Each magazine holds 45 rounds, giving the rifle an immense 90-round ammo supply. With dual magazines it is possible to carry mixed ammo types. The LPA1 can use most ammo options and can support rifle-fired grenades with a small muzzle modification. The rifle comes with three velocity settings, which can be selected either manually or by neural interface for smartchipped versions. The settings are 1) Low-riot/2D6+ 1, 2) Medium-urban/4D6, and 3) High-full combat/6D6. Because of the high recoil on full velocity, a hydro-pneumatic recoil damper was built into the rifle. The liquid propellant (a derivative of ESA shuttle fuel) is injected into the breech under computer control. The amount injected depends on the velocity setting and range of the target This information comes from the integral Marconi SUSAT cyberoptic sight situated on top of the receiver.
